# SupportedActivityFamiliesEnvironmentKey

**Structure**

An environment key for the size of a rendered Live Activity.

## Declaration

```swift
struct SupportedActivityFamiliesEnvironmentKey
```

## Overview

To detect the currently rendered activity family size, use the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/SwiftUI/EnvironmentValues/activityFamily] environment variable.

## Conforms To

- EnvironmentKey
title: SupportedActivityFamiliesEnvironmentKey
